Container.Name: batchcutencode
Container.Changes: [center][font size=5]batchcurencode Change Log[/font][/center] [font size=4]2018.04.21[/font] - Initial version.
Container.Overview:
batchcutencode is designed to re-encode recorded videos, but will encode any mp4/mkv/avi to mp4.
cut directory - videos will have 5 seconds cut off the beginning and end, and then be moved to the encode directory. encode directory - videos will be re-encoded using HandBrake's normal preset. complete directory - videos that have completed encoding
Container.Description: batchcutencode is designed to reencode recorded videos, but will encode any mp4/mkv/avi to mp4.
